C

calculateMove(Board) - Method in class ExpertAI
Calculates the optimal move for the board based on the opponents move
calculateMove(Board) - Method in class IntermediateAI
Calls the alpha-beta function on consecutive future turns originating from a single move and returns a score of that move
calculateScore(Board) - Method in class ExpertAI
Evaluates the current state of the board
calculateScore(Board) - Method in class IntermediateAI
Scans the board and adds or takes away score based on tokens located in given columns and the player which owns the token Takes away score for opponent turns and adds score for its own tokens
checkFour(int[], int) - Method in class Board
Checks for if a player has won the game
clearBoard() - Method in class GUIBoard
Clears the board
clone() - Method in class Board
Creates a clone of the board
